text: @realDonaldTrump CORRECTION: For the first time in history, due to the total, abject failure of the @POTUS, it was necessary to declare all 50 States a disaster area. Yet, the real disaster is the @WhiteHouse. Despite @realDonaldTrump’s ineptitude, we will win the fight against the coronavirus!
